name: Sir. Ball-Up
description:
Just a ball, wrongfully imprisoned, seeking retribution.
Follow him on his journey to get it.
One of the most demanding games on Steam.

Story

Sir. Ballup is a time and skill-based level climber filled with characters and mystery. Wrongfully imprisoned by his father, Sir. Ball-Up is on a journey up to his father's throne room to claim the crown which is rightfully his. Using his trusty arrow, Sir. Ball-Up will make his way up, needing precision and accuracy to accomplish his task.

Gameplay

Using his arrow for direction and power, Sir. Ball-Up must climb different landscapes and head up as high as he can, but beware, falling is detrimental as there are no save points. One of the most complicated games to complete, Sir. Ballup makes its mark as a notch to all who can achieve it. Players must be precise but also patient if they have any hope of helping Sir. Ball-Up reach the end.

How to play Sir. Ball-Up

Using the mouse button, players are to stop a moving arrow to show the direction they want to head in. After that, using the mouse button again the player must stop the power bar to show how hard to shoot Sir. Ballup. Climb different screens dodging obstacles and gaining height. There is no saving in the game other than the last player's position. If you fall, you fall. Ensure to be precise with the movements or it could cost you.
